name: Elders Block II
description:
Play life as a criminal become a hacker & Join a masive thieves guild as Livesec. Shooting Hacking Robbing & Become rich. Livesec is now a app including stocks. that you can buy guns with. Live chat & more interactive with. Better cars & Graphics. Along with more crime & better missions.

As you progress through the story your map will began to enlarge & your properties will increase along as map changes.

once the game is complete you will be awarded with $14.000.000. & free roam with better activities.

NOTE

THE OFFICIAL ELDERS BLOCK II LEGION HAS BEEN EXLUDED DUE TO NUMEROUS BUGS

LATEST UPDATE.

Bug fixes. Arcade. Map remaster for whole game. More mobile friendly.  Bug FIxes. Map Changes. faster gameplay.  Dark map.
